title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description:
Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the navigator
2. Select both P1 and P2 projects

Observed Behavior:
Notice that the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.

Expected Behavior:
Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available for selection when multiple projects are selected in the navigator.
OB: Notice that the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available for selection when multiple projects are selected in the navigator.
SR:
1. Open the navigator
2. Select both P1 and P2 projects
